==Trivia==
===Etymology ===
* {{fr|Romaritime}} is a portmanteau of the French words {{fr|romarin|rosemary}} and {{fr|maritime|maritime.}} 
** The Chinese name likely refers to the fact that {{fr|romarin|rosemary}} ultimately derives from Latin ''ros marinus'' meaning "dew of the sea."
